title: Break Watch Face
summary: Android Wear Watch Face - Move the coffee cup on your watch and take a break
description: You are overworked and need a break from emails, calls or other notifications? Just move the coffee cup on your watch and take a break.Interactive Function - Swipe the coffee cup on your watch and take a break - Mute during a break (do not disturb)Display - Date & Time - Current break time (in min.) - Different Styles: Coffee, Dark Coffee or Material Design Extras - Smooth seconds - Hide date - Tap to unlock cup (enable in settings if needed)*** Can also be used as pomodoro timer or countdown ***Tested on: - Moto 360
descriptionHTML:
You are overworked and need a break from emails, calls or other notifications? Just move the coffee cup on your watch and take a break.


Interactive Function
- Swipe the coffee cup on your watch and take a break
- Mute during a break (do not disturb)

Display
- Date & Time
- Current break time (in min.)
- Different Styles: Coffee, Dark Coffee or Material Design

Extras
- Smooth seconds
- Hide date
- Tap to unlock cup (enable in settings if needed)


*** Can also be used as pomodoro timer or countdown ***


Tested on:
- Moto 360
comments: Simple and love it. Would like to see preset pomodoro timer and more styles.
So simple yet awsome! Love the style!
recentChanges: - Now you can take a break > 1h
- Tap to unlock cup (enable in settings if needed)
